  • Reference

    Get all odds for selected sports

    get_sport_df.Rd

    Get all odds for selected sports

    Usage

    get_sport_df(sport, bet_status, next_hours = 24)

    Arguments

    sport

    Sports list between "Tennis", "Basketball", and "Baseball". Others sports are not yet implemented.

    bet_status

    "PREMATCH" or "LIVE"

    next_hours

    next_hours

    Value

    Odds for selected sports.

    Examples

    library(rvest)
library(xml2)
library(jsonlite)

# Tennis bets for next 3 hours:
get_sport_df(sport = "Tennis", bet_status = "PREMATCH", next_hours = 3)
